'''''Minecraft: Whimsical Compilation (Original Soundtrack)''''' is an album featuring compositions by James Everingham which consist of the songs that were released as part of the {{w|Dr. Seuss bibliography|Dr. Seuss}} DLC. It was released on October 15, 2024, the same day that the DLC was released on the Marketplace.
